currentlyReading.title: The Sympathizer
currentlyReading.author: Viet Thanh Nguyen
currentlyReading.thoughts: A brilliant exploration of identity and belonging through the lens of a Vietnamese refugee.

currentlyReading.title: Atomic Habits
currentlyReading.author: James Clear
currentlyReading.thoughts: Practical insights on building sustainable habits and breaking bad ones.

wishlist.title: Tomorrow, and Tomorrow, and Tomorrow
wishlist.author: Gabrielle Zevin
wishlist.reason: Heard great things about this exploration of friendship and creativity in game development.

wishlist.title: The Ministry of Time
wishlist.author: Kaliane Bradley
wishlist.reason: Time travel romance mixed with bureaucracy—sounds fascinating.

wishlist.title: Dune Messiah
wishlist.author: Frank Herbert
wishlist.reason: Continuing the Dune saga after falling in love with the first book.

wishlist.title: Exhalation
wishlist.author: Ted Chiang
wishlist.reason: Short stories that supposedly bend the mind—right up my alley.
